class_notes: EMPH Students Only; Outside permission to enroll in course must be approved by EMPH leadership. EMPH Opening Weekend is January 13-15 and Closing Weekend is April 14-16
course_description: Introduces students to qualitative research methods used in public health and applied settings. Content covers relevant aspects of qualitative research including research design, sampling, construction of data collection instruments, data collection techniques including observation, interviewing and focus groups, validity and reliability in qualitative research, analysis, and ethical issues.
prerequisites:
Prereq. for AEPI Students: AEPI 530D, AEPI 534D, AEPI 536D, AEPI 538D, BIOS 516D, BIOS 517D, BIOS 518D, or by special permission to enroll.
Prereq. for PRS Students: PRS 505D, PRS 535D, PRS 542D, as prerequisites or by special permission to enroll.
